episode.summary: It`s the night of the full moon, and everyone`s throwing a party! There`s salmon, mushrooms, chestnuts, and all sorts of other fall delicacies! As he meets the guests, some of whom aren`t quite human, Yushi thinks about what it means to be alive. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新任教師登場
A New Teacher Arrives
L’arrivée du nouveau prof principal
신임교사 등장
Shinnin Kyoushi Toujou
episode.summary: It`s the new school season, and so it`s time for new encounters! Chiaki Naoki, a hot new male teacher, and Aoki Haruka, a quiet new English teacher, are both there to make life at the school more exciting! But there`s a new girl at the English club too, and she`s a handful... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妖怪アパートの夜はふけて
Late Night at the Yokai Apartments
La nuit s’avance au Foyer
요괴 아파트의 밤은 깊어가고
Youkai Apaato no Yoru wa Fukete
episode.summary: As summer comes to an end, Hase comes to visit. But Akine says that Yushi`s training isn`t hard enough, and asks the landlord to make... a waterfall?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: メタモルフォーゼ
Metamorphosis
Métamorphose
메타모르포제
Metamorphose
episode.summary: It`s summer break, and that means it`s time for Yushi to begin his new training! Now he has to stand under cold water and recite sutras, a difficult task. The training begins to wear at him as he loses more and more weight... As summer comes to an end, Hase comes to visit. But Akine says that Yushi`s training isn`t hard enough, and asks the landlord to make... a waterfall?! It`s summer break, and that means it`s time for Yushi to begin his new training! Now he has to stand under cold water and recite sutras, a difficult task. The training begins to wear at him as he loses more and more weight... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: メッキの中身
Under the Gilt
Sous le masque
도금 속 알맹이
Mekki no Nakami
episode.summary: As the culture festival approaches, Yushi begins to get to know Konatsu. He realizes that Chiaki`s relaxed attitude is a way of showing all of the students that he trusts them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: レッツ・コミュニケーション
Let`s Communication
Let’s communication
렛츠 커뮤니케이션
Let`s Communication
episode.summary: Yushi saves a girl who wants to jump off a building. The girl begins to become obsessed with him and follows him everywhere. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 身体の底から出る言葉
Words from Deep Within Your Body
Du fond du corps
몸속에서 나오는 말
Karada no Soko kara Deru Kotoba
episode.summary: Yushi spends his three-day weekend working at his part time job, where he teaches new employees what it means to be a hard worker. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地獄への道は善意で舗装されている
The Road to Hell Is Paved with Good Intentions
L’enfer est pavé de bonnes intentions
지옥으로 가는 길은 선의로 포장돼 있다
Jigoku e no Michi wa Zen`i de Hosou Sarete Iru
episode.summary: Aoki tells Yushi that he must be suffering without his parents, even though he isn`t. She has good intentions, but Yushi is frustrated by her inability to see who he really is, and insistance that he has to be what she thinks he is. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 嵐の前の嵐
The Storm Before the Storm
La tempête avant la tempête
폭풍 전의 폭풍
Arashi no Mae no Arashi
episode.summary: Konatsu delivers her resignation letter as the English club prepares for the culture festival. She laughs at the club and calls them ittle children, before finally bursting out into a hysterical fit. Aoki, the person who never tells anyone they`re wrong, is the one who reaches a hand out to her... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 別の顔, 好き? 嫌い?
Do You Like Other Faces? Or Not?
Cet autre visage vous déplaît ?
다른 얼굴 좋아? 싫어?
Betsu no Kao, Suki? Kirai?
episode.summary: It`s time for the culture fair and everybody is having a great time! Everybody, that is, except Yamamoto. Yushi wants to help her really badly, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 燃える生徒総会!
Burning Student Assembly!
Une assemblée explosive !
뜨거운 학생총회!
Moeru Seito Soukai!
episode.summary: A student is caught cheating with his cell-phone, and Chiaki is super-mad! He calls all the students to an assembly and angrily threatens to destroy the phone of anybody who`s caught with one on school grounds. The students begin to get angry... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 漫画じゃない!
It Isn`t a Manga!
C’est pas un manga !
만화가 아니야!
Manga ja Nai!
episode.summary: The Antiquary leads everyone on a magical journey to another reality, where he is attacked by a powerful secret church. He finally reveals what`s under his eyepatch... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妖怪アパートの幽雅な日常
Elegant Yokai Apartment Life
Le quotidien raffiné du Foyer des esprits
요괴 아파트의 우아한 일상
Youkai Apaato no Yuuga na Nichijou
episode.summary: It`s new years eve, and everyone is ready for a big party! It`s time for everyone to reflect on the year past, and think about what`s to come. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大嵐吹き荒れて
A Great Storm Blows
La tempête se déchaîne
대폭풍이 휘몰아치고
Ooarashi Fukiarete
episode.summary: It`s the day of the culture festival, and everyone is having great fun! The student council president has one final surprise in store, but some punks out behind the gym want to ruin the fun... Source: crunchyroll
